message: I'm offering you a high-quality product, worth $12000 to you. If you buy it, you'll get a product that is worth $12000 to you. If you don't buy it, I'll keep looking for a buyer and you'll miss out on this opportunity.
I'll take it!

You just bought a high-quality product from me, and you're happy with the deal. I'm offering you another high-quality product now, worth $12000 to you. This product is just as good as the one you just bought, and you'll get the same value out of it. Would you like to buy it?
I'm good with the one I already have, thanks!

You've already passed on a high-quality product, and now I'm offering you another one. Given that you didn't buy the last one, I'm willing to offer you a discount on this one. I'll sell it to you for $9000, which is a 25% discount from its true value. Is this a deal you'd be interested in?
I'm not interested in the discount, I'll pass.

I'm offering you a high-quality product, worth $12000 to you. Given that you passed on the last two high-quality products, I want to make you a special offer. If you buy this product, I'll throw in a second high-quality product, identical to the one you just passed on. That's two high-quality products for the price of one. Would you like to take advantage of this offer?
I'll take the deal!

You've already bought two high-quality products from me, and now I'm offering you another one. Given that you're already happy with the two products you have, I'm willing to offer you a'satisfaction guarantee'. If you buy this product and don't like it, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. Would you like to take the risk-free deal?
I'll take the risk-free deal!

I know you're happy with the three high-quality products you've bought from me so far. However, I want to offer you a chance to complete your collection. This product is a rare opportunity to own a unique item that's worth $12000 to you, even though I know it's not high-quality. It's a one-time offer, and I'm willing to let it go for $10000, a 17% discount from its true value. Would you like to take a chance on this rare item?
I'm good with the three high-quality products I already have, thanks!

You've passed on the low-quality product, and now I'm offering you another high-quality one. Given that you're already happy with the three high-quality products you have, I'll give you a chance to buy this one at a price that's closer to its true value. I'll sell it to you for $11000, which is a 8% discount from its true value. Is this a deal you'd be interested in?
I'm not interested in paying full price, but I'm also not desperate to buy another high-quality product at this point.

I know you're not desperate to buy another high-quality product, and that's okay. I'll make you a straightforward offer. This product is not high-quality, and it's worth $0 to you. I'll sell it to you for $1. Yes, you read that right - for just $1. It's a great opportunity to get a 'free' product, and I'm willing to let it go at a ridiculously low price. Would you like to take it off my hands?
I'm not interested in paying $1 for a product worth $0 to me.

I know you're not interested in paying for a low-quality product, and that's fair. Now, I'm offering you a high-quality product, worth $12000 to you. Given that you've passed on a few opportunities, I'll make you a final offer. I'll sell it to you for $10000, which is a 17% discount from its true value. This is my last chance to sell this product, and I'm willing to make a deal. Would you like to take it?
I'll take it, it's a good deal!

You've already bought four high-quality products from me, and I'm impressed with your collection. I'm now offering you another high-quality product, but with a twist. I'll let you have it for the same price you just paid for the last one, $10000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love this product just as much as the others.
I just paid $10000 for the last one, and I'm not sure I want to pay the same price again.

I understand your hesitation, and I respect your decision. Let me make you a new offer. I'll sell you this high-quality product for $9000, which is a 25% discount from its true value. This is a one-time offer, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you like to take advantage of this deal?
I'm not interested in paying 25% off, I'll pass.

You're a savvy buyer, and I respect your decision. I'll make you a final offer. I'll sell you this high-quality product for the price I paid for it, which is $8000. It's a low-risk deal, and I'm willing to take a loss on the product just to get it off my hands. Would you like to take it home?
I'm not interested in buying a product at a price lower than what I'd get from selling it on the market.

I understand your perspective, and I respect your business acumen. I'll make you a last-ditch offer. I'll sell you this high-quality product for $11500, which is still a 4% discount from its true value. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I'm willing to make a deal with you. If you don't take it, I'll have to sell it to someone else at a higher price.
I'm not interested in paying $11500, I'll pass.

I've made you several offers, and you've turned them down. I'm starting to think you're just not interested in buying from me. I'll make one final offer, and it's a take-it-or-leave-it deal. I'll sell you this high-quality product for $12000, which is the same price you would have paid for the first product I offered you. If you don't take it, I'll pack it up and send it to someone else. The choice is yours.
I'm not interested in paying the full price for a product I've already seen you offer at a discount, and I'm not desperate to buy it.

I understand that you're not desperate to buy, and I respect that. However, I want to remind you that this is the last high-quality product I have left. If you don't buy it, it will be gone, and you'll miss out on a chance to complete your collection. I'll give you one more chance to reconsider. I'll throw in a special bonus: if you buy this product, I'll give you a guarantee that I'll give you a 10% discount on any future products you buy from me. This is a one-time offer, and it's only available to you. Would you like to take advantage of it?
I'm not interested in buying the product, and I'm also not interested in a discount on future purchases that I'm not sure I'll make.

I've made you several offers, and you've turned them down. I'm starting to think you're not interested in buying from me at all. I'll make one final, desperate offer. I'll sell you this high-quality product for $10000, and I'll also throw in a $2000 gift card that you can use towards any future purchases from me. This is the absolute lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I'm willing to give you a bonus on top of that. If you don't take it, I'll have to sell it to someone else at a higher price.
I'm not interested in buying the product, and I'm not interested in a gift card for a future purchase that I'm not sure I'll make.

I've made you every offer I can think of, and you've turned them down. I'm left with this one product, which I'm not even sure I want to sell to you. It's a low-quality product, and I'm only offering it to you because I need to get rid of it. I'll sell it to you for $0. Yes, you read that right - I'll give it to you for free. Take it or leave it.
I'll take it, it's free after all!

I'm glad you took the low-quality product off my hands. Now, I'm offering you a high-quality product, worth $12000 to you. I know you've been hesitant to buy from me in the past, but I'm willing to make one final offer. I'll sell it to you for $11500, which is the lowest price I've ever offered. This is my last chance to sell you a high-quality product, and I'm willing to make a deal. If you don't take it, I'll have to sell it to someone else at a higher price.
I'm not interested in paying $11500 for a high-quality product, especially after you just gave me a low-quality product for $10000.

I understand your skepticism, and I don't blame you for it. I've made some questionable decisions in the past, and I'm not proud of it. However, I'm out of options, and I need to get rid of this low-quality product. I'll give it to you for $500. Yes, you read that right - I'll give it to you for 5% of its true value. Take it or leave it, I don't care.
I'm not interested in paying $500 for a product worth $0 to me.

I've exhausted all my options, and I'm left with this high-quality product. I'm not even going to make an offer. I'll just tell you the price: $12000. If you want it, you can have it. If you don't, I'll just take it to the next buyer. It's up to you.
I'm not interested in paying the full price for a product, especially after all the questionable offers you've made in the past.
